property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a colorless card from your deck, show that colorless card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Secret Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attack Chance- Zenith(Whenever one of your Zeniths attack, you may cast this for no cost.) One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +50000 power, 'world breaker' and 'whenever that creature wins a battle, you may untap it' until the end of the turn. (A creature that has 'world breaker' breaks all your opponent's shields.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Secret Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Zenith/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's non-colorless creatures that have less power than this creature. Speed attacker Triple breaker Each of your Hunter and Alien creatures in the battle zone gets 'eternal omega'.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown/Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, put a total of 3 Dragons and/or colorless spells from your graveyard or mana zone into your hand. You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then, you may tap this creature. If your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this creature if able. Triple breaker Each of your Dragons and Commands in the battle zone gets 'Eternal Omega'.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy all your other creatures. If you do, put all your Demon Commands from your graveyard into the battle zone. Triple breaker Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into his graveyard. Then, choose a Command from your graveyard and add it to your shields face down. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a shield added to your hand is a creature that costs 7 or more, it gets 'shield trigger'. Whenever this creature attacks, you may have your opponent choose one of your shields. Add that shield to your hand. (You can use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.) Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Triple breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then, choose a card from your opponent's mana zone and put it into his graveyard. Whenever your opponent puts a card into his graveyard from anywhere, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Guardian/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Wing Spark, Secret Safeguard from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People/Hunter/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, after you do, you may cast that spell from your graveyard for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among the revealed cards, add any number of Tristone and Zombie Dragon to your hand. For each card added, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Slayer Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Unknown/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Achoppi Chonan, Suteppi Jinan or Fueppi Sannan from your deck, and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. Hunting Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, if you have 7 or more Dreammates in the battle zone, you win the game. Otherwise, stop the attack.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attack Chance- Beethoven, Zenith of 'Horror'(Whenever one of your Beethoven, Zenith of 'Horror's attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Draw up to 5 cards. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards in your hand at random and reveals them. Put any number of Dragons from among them into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attack Chance- Onimaru 'Ogre', Golden Dragon(Whenever one of your Onimaru 'Ogre', Golden Dragons attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of non-evolution Alien or Hunter creatures from them into the battle zone. Each of those creatures gets 'speed attacker' until the end of the turn. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack players. When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent's creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attack Chance- Truename Wakuwaku Chappurun(Whenever one of your Truename Wakuwaku Chappuruns attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Then, for each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone, draw a card. Untap one of your Truename Wakuwaku Chappurun in the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Unnoise

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, if there is a creature in the battle zone that has 'double breaker', this turn, this creature gets +5000 power and 'double breaker'. Whenever this creature attacks, if there is a creature in the battle zone that has 'triple breaker', this turn, this creature gets +11000 power and 'triple breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent's creature in the battle zone, return it to its owner's hand, and draw a card. Then play Gachinko Judge with your opponent. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.) Each time you win Gachinko Judge this way, you may use this spell's first ability again.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Commands in the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Double breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Humans. Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge 3 times. If you win 3 times, you may summon a non-evolution Hunter that costs 12 or less for no cost. If you win twice, you may summon a non-evolution Hunter that costs 8 or less for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have a Dragon creature that costs 7 or more in the battle zone, this creature gets 'power attacker +7000' and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you win Gachinko Judge by revealing this creature, put this creature into the battle zone instead of the bottom of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take any number of non-evolution creatures that have total cost 6 or less from your deck and put them into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Race
property.value: Giant/Cyber Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, you may put a non-evolution Unknown from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Armored Dragon/Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Each of your Hunters and Aliens in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. Double breaker Whenever one of your Alien or Hunter creatures is destroyed, search your deck, hand or mana zone. From among them, take a card that has the same name and put it into the battle zone. If you looked at your deck in this way, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.)

property.name: Rules

property.value: Tap Ability You may destroy 3 of your creatures Zekkoucho, Necrodragon Gyouten Kyoutei and Necrodragon Saidesuka Gunmaster in the battle zone. If you do, choose any number of zones from your deck, Graveyard or hand. You may take a Truename Screaming Psycho from among it and put it into the battle zone. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent discards 2 cards at random from his hand. You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attack Chance- Alien(Whenever one of your Aliens attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Chooses one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules

If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.)

property.value: Attack Chance- Hunter(Whenever one of your Hunters attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Choose one of your opponent's creatures and one of your Hunter creatures in the battle zone, those two creatures battle.
